topic.title: How to Enforce a Number of Lines from Paragraphs that Continue in Next Page

indexterm.product: author developer editor authorEclipse developerEclipse editorEclipse

body.p: In typography, an orphan is the first line of a paragraph that appears alone at the bottom of a page (the paragraph continues on a following page), while a widow is the last line of a paragraph that appears alone at the top of a page.
